data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Wangduephodrang, Bhutan, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Wangduephodrang, Bhutan

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Wangduephodrang, Bhutan a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 18 believers in Wangduephodrang, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Wangduephodrang to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Bhotia Sikkim people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Lord, the believers in the state of Wangduephodrang, Bhutan need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Father, help 1 new simple churches start among the 9,000 people in the state of Wangduephodrang, Bhutan. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Wangduephodrang, Bhutan to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

location.name: Wangduephodrang
location.people_groups_list: Rajbansi (Hindu traditions), Loba, Bania, Oraon, Gurung Ghaleg
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Rajbansi (Hindu traditions) (9,600), Loba (2,200), Bania (3,800), Oraon (10,000), Gurung Ghaleg (10,000)
